channel.title: Community on IPFS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Community on IPFS Documentation

item.title: IRC
item.description: There are several IRC channels on Freenode dedicated to IPFS, and it’s a great place for live chat: Use #ipfs on irc.freenode.org for general IPFS usage and community chat. Use #ipfs-dev on irc.freenode.org for discussing implementation details, especially if you are contributing code to IPFS. For longer-lived discussions and for support, please use the discussion forums at https://discuss.ipfs.io instead of IRC! It’s easy for complex discussions to get lost in a sea of new messages on IRC.
